editor.label: Application server - IIS Add SSL Certificate
editor.description: Adds SSL certificate to the specified port.

formElement.label: IP:
formElement.documentation: IP address or hostname to add certificate, e.g. 0.0.0.0. Either this parameter or Hostname should be provided.

formElement.label: Hostname:
formElement.documentation: Hostname for the certificate, e.g. mysite.com. Either this parameter or IP should be provided.

formElement.label: Port:
formElement.documentation: Port to add SSL certificate, e.g. 443.

formElement.label: Certificate Store:
formElement.documentation: The name of the certificate store, e.g. My.

formElement.label: Certificate Hash (Thumbprint):
